question: She likes to swim ___ (and, but) bike.
He wanted to go out, ___ (but, so) it started raining.
We can go to the park, ___ (or, and) we can stay home.
She was tired, ___ (but, and) she kept working.
He studied hard, ___ (so, but) he passed the test.
The weather is nice, ___ (so, but) we are going for a walk.
She likes tea, ___ (and, but) he prefers coffee.
You can have cake ___ (or, and) ice cream for dessert.
They went to the movies, ___ (but, so) they missed the bus.
